Articles.Content:
Here you all the Nova Shuttle:

![A7D70142F601EFA78941D0814B57A3C03CEB477D](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45380580657233903/A7D70142F601EFA78941D0814B57A3C03CEB477D/)

A fine solution to mix aestetic and functionality! Flyes well inside and out atmosphere!

Wish to thank inigma for his STS launch system (that I'm using and I love!) and people from Kerbin Shuttle Orbiter System mod for the inspiration!

Craft file:

[Nova Shuttle](https://www.dropbox.com/s/fbhjhwx037j8h7i/Nova%20Shuttle%20System.craft?dl=0)

Action groups:

1) Ascent engines

2) Orbital engines

3) Jet engines (optional/emergency)

4) Solar panels

Warning: Always remember to close air intakes before launch!

Enjoy!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-04T08:52:11Z" title="06/04/2015 08:52  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 4, 2015</time> by stardestroyer**

> 
> Is this.... An SSTO shuttle? ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

No, it's a traditional asimmetrical launch system. I use inigma's STS launch system. You can find on this thread:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108219-STS-5-Space-Shuttle-%28Stock-NASA-Replica%29-New-Sub!-STS-ComSats-%28RemoteTech%29-5-31-15](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108219-STS-5-Space-Shuttle-%28Stock-NASA-Replica%29-New-Sub!-STS-ComSats-%28RemoteTech%29-5-31-15)

It's already included in the craft file! (with just some tweaks!) ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
What an interesting array of engines.
